snippet.title: Autobahn Police Simulator 3 | Off-Road DLC | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
COMING SOON | https://store.steampowered.com/app/2068070/Autobahn_Police_Simulator_3_OffRoad_DLC/

Take on new missions in the expanded story mode and crack your cases with new gameplay mechanics such as evidence checks. Chase down criminals in remote terrains with the help of your new team member: a tracking dog! With the brand-new police vehicle designed specifically for off-road navigation, you will be perfectly prepared to venture off the beaten tracks and outmanoeuvre criminals in the extended car chases. 

For more news and information follow us: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AutobahnPoliceSimulator
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aerosoftgmbh

#autobahnpolicesimulator #zsoftware #aerosoft 

© 2023 AEROSOFT. All rights reserved. All trademarks and brand names are trademarks or registered trademarks of the respective owners.
